events.message: The applicant submitted a personal loan application seeking funds for upcoming medical expenses and debt consolidation.
The loan application was categorised under Personal Loan based on the mention of medical bills and debt repayment purpose.
A loan officer was assigned to the case to assist the applicant with queries and document submissions promptly.
The loan officer completed an initial review of the application focusing on financial history and stated loan purpose.
Documents related to income verification, medical bills, and outstanding debts were requested from the applicant.
Applicant provided all requested documents including recent pay slips, medical invoices, and credit statements.
A comprehensive credit check was carried out to assess the creditworthiness and repayment capacity of the applicant.
Based on credit and financial data, the risk assessment was completed to determine loan eligibility and terms.
A loan offer was presented to the applicant including interest rate, repayment schedule, and loan amount details.
The applicant responded positively to the offer and requested some clarifications on repayment flexibility.
The application was escalated to senior management due to applicant’s request for special repayment terms.
Senior management approved the loan with modified repayment terms accommodating the applicant’s needs.
The loan amount was disbursed to the applicant’s bank account for urgent use with all formalities completed.
A follow-up was conducted to ensure that the applicant was satisfied and that the loan servicing started smoothly.
The loan application file was officially closed after confirming all processes were completed and satisfactory.
